properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
F
Hosanna, Hosanna,
Hosanna in the highest
Hosanna, Hosanna,
Hosanna in the highest

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Lord we lift up Your Name
With our hearts full of praise
We exalt You oh Lord our God
Hosanna in the highest

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Glory, Glory,
Glory to the King of kings
Glory, Glory,
Glory to the King of kings

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Praise Him, praise Him,
praise Him,
He is Lord of Lords.
Praise Him, praise Him,
praise Him,
He is Lord of Lords.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Jesus, Jesus,
Jesus is the Lord of Lords.
Jesus, Jesus,
Jesus is the Lord of Lords.
